peekOfCode:
arr = [10,8,5,2,1]
cur = arr[-1]
for i in range(len(arr)-2,-1,-1):
    t = arr[i]-cur
    cur = arr[i]
    arr[i] = t
print(arr)

peekOfCode:
arr = [0, 1, 3, 6, 10, 15]
if __name__ == "__main__":
    cur = arr[0]
    for i in range(1,len(arr)):
        t = arr[i]-cur
        cur = arr[i]
        arr[i] = t
    arr[0] = 0
    print(arr)
